headline: Assurant to Announce First Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: ATLANTA, April 07, 2025--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a premier global protection company that safeguards and services connected devices, homes and automobiles in partnership with the world’s leading brands, will release first quarter 2025 financial results on Tuesday, May 6, 2025, after the market closes. The news release will be available on Assurant's website at www.assurant.com. In conjunction with the news release, Assurant will host a conference call the following morning, Wednesday, May 7,
